title: Did Melania Trump’s One-Day Stay at a Cairo Hotel Cost the U.S. Government $95,000?
subtitle: Some news reports got certain important details wrong about a State Department payment to the Semiramis Intercontinental Hotel in October 2018.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: First Lady Melania Trump's one-day stay at a hotel in Cairo cost the U.S. government $95,050.
